text: "Light Up My Life" is a Japanese-language song recorded by Japanese singer songwriter Mai Kuraki, taken from her twelfth studio album Kimi Omou: Shunkashūtō (2018).. It was released on March 16, 2018 by Northern Music and served as the theme song to the role-playing video game Valkyria Chronicles 4. The song was written by Kuraki herself, shilo and Shuho Mitani. ==Track listing== ==Credits and personnel== Credits adapted from here. *Mai Kuraki – vocals, backing vocals, writer *shilo - writer *Shuho Mitani – writer *Koichiro Muroya - violin *Takayuki Yoshimura - piano *Naoki Kobayashi - bass *Kanonji – production, executive producer ==Charts== ===Weekly charts=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Chart (2018) ! scope="col" | Peak position |- |Japan (Billboard Japan Top Download Songs) |style="text- align:center;"|59 |- |Japan RecoChoku (RecoChoku Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|29 |- |Japan mora (mora Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|11 |- |Japan music.jp (music.jp Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|37 |- |Japan music.jp (Dwango Weekly Singles) |style="text- align:center;"|97 |- |} ==Release history== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col"| Region ! scope="col"| Date ! scope="col"| Format ! scope="col"| Label |- |Japan |March 16, 2018 | Digital download |Northern Music |- |} ==References== Category:2018 singles Category:2018 songs Category:Mai Kuraki songs Category:Songs written by Mai Kuraki Category:Song recordings produced by Daiko Nagato
